entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
